DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study of sleep disordered breathing in a lung cancer screening cohort.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Sleep Disordered Breathing in a Lung Cancer Screening Cohort
DOC.detailed_description: The proposed study is a prospective single arm study evaluating the prevalence of sleep disordered breathing in a cohort of lung cancer screening patients.
DOC.criteria: Age 5575. > 30 pack years tobacco exposure. Enrolled in lung cancer screening program. Inability or unwillingness to undergo a home sleep study.
